Service Details: - Welcomes residents from the Kelowna area and visitors from all over the world- Offers information and educates visitors on activities, attractions and accommodation- Operates the Kelowna Visitor Centre and the Information Kiosk at Kelowna International Airport
Dates: Please contact the Visitor Centre for seasonal hours of operation
How to Apply: Please visit our website for additional information and to volunteer
